hero_subtitle.en: Manage all your digital subscriptions in one secure place. Access Netflix, Amazon Prime, and more with ease through our localized platform.
hero_subtitle.am: የዲጂታል ክፍያዎችን ሁሉንም በአንድ ቦታ ይክፈሉ። Netflix፣ Amazon Prime እና ሌሎች አገልግሎቶችን  ይጠቀሙ።

faq_2_q.en: What payment methods do you accept?

faq_3_q.en: How long does it take to activate my subscription?
faq_3_q.am: የአገልግሎት ፈቃድ ለማግኘት ስንት ጊዜ ይወስዳል፧

faq_4_q.en: Can I manage my subscriptions anytime?

faq_1_a.en: Birr Pay lets you manage and pay for all your digital subscriptions in one place. Choose a service, submit your request, and our admin will activate your subscription after payment confirmation.
faq_1_a.am: Birr Pay የዲጂታል ክፍያን ሁሉንም በአንድ ቦታ መቆጣጠርና መክፈል ያስችላል። አገልግሎት ይምረጡ፣ ጥያቄዎን ያቅርቡ፣ ክፍያዎ ከተረጋገጠ በኋላ አስተዳዳሪው መዋቅሩን ያስጀምራል።

faq_2_a.en: We accept bank transfer, TeleBirr, and other local payment methods. You will receive instructions after placing your order.
faq_2_a.am: የባንክ ማስተላለፊያ፣ ቴሌብር፣ እና ሌሎች ሃገራዊ የክፍያ መንገዶችን እንቀበላለን። ትዕዛዝዎን ከጨረሱ በኋላ መመሪያዎችን ይቀበላሉ።

faq_3_a.en: Most subscriptions are activated within a few minutes after payment is confirmed. Some services may take up to 24 hours.
faq_3_a.am: አብዛኛዎቹ መዋቅሮች ክፍያዎ ከተረጋገጠ በኋላ በጥቂት ደቂቃዎች ውስጥ ይነቃቃሉ። አንዳንድ አገልግሎቶች እስከ 24 ሰዓታት ሊወስዱ ይችላሉ።

faq_4_a.en: Yes, you can view, renew, or cancel your subscriptions at any time through our platform.
faq_4_a.am: አዎን፣ መዋቅሮችዎን በማንኛውም ጊዜ ማየት፣ ማደስ ወይም መሰረዝ ይችላሉ።

pending_request.en: Your request has been recorded and is awaiting approval by our admin. You will be notified once approved.

approved.en: ✔️ Your subscription for **{service}** has been approved and is now active. Next renewal: *{date}*
approved.am: ✔️ ለ**{service}** የተደረገው መዋቅር ተፈቅዷል። ቀጣዩ ክፍያ: *{date}*

cancel_tip.en: ✅ To cancel anytime, tap the ‘Cancel’ button below each active item.

support_received.en: Thank you! Your message has been received. We will reply shortly (admin manually reviews).
support_received.am: እመሰግናለን! መልእክትዎን ተቀብለናል። በቅርቡ እናሳውቆታለን። (አስተዳዳሪ ይጣራል።)

help_text.en:
Welcome to BirrPay - Ethiopia's Premier Subscription Hub!

📋 Available Commands:

/start - Main menu and services
/help - Show this help message
/faq - Frequently asked questions
/lang en - Switch to English
/lang am - Switch to Amharic
/mysubs - View your active subscriptions
/support - Contact support

💡 How it works:
1. Choose a service from /start
2. Submit your subscription request
3. Make payment as instructed
4. Admin approves and activates
5. Enjoy your subscription!

💰 Payment Methods:
• Bank Transfer
• TeleBirr
• Other local methods

📧 Support: support@admin.birr‑pay
💬 Telegram: @birrpaysupportline or @Birrpaysupport
help_text.am:
እንኳን ወደ BirrPay - ወደ የኢትዮጵያ ዋና የክፍያ አገልግሎት በደህና መጡ!

📋 የሚገኙ ትዕዛዞች:

/start - ዋና ሜኑ እና አገልግሎቶች
/help - ይህንን የእርዳታ መልእክት አሳይ
/faq - በተደጋጋሚ የሚጠየቁ ጥያቄዎች
/lang en - ወደ እንግሊዝኛ ቀይር
/lang am - ወደ አማርኛ ቀይር
/mysubs - የእርስዎን ንቁ መዋቅሮች ይመልከቱ
/support - ድጋፍ ያግኙ

💡 እንዴት እንደሚሰራ:
1. ከ/start አገልግሎት ይምረጡ
2. የመዋቅር ጥያቄዎን ያቅርቡ
3. እንደተመረጠው ክፍያ ያድርጉ
4. አስተዳዳሪ ያፈቅዳል እና ያነቃቃል
5. መዋቅሩን ይደሰቱ!

💰 የክፍያ መንገዶች:
• የባንክ ማስተላለፊያ
• ቴሌብር
• ሌሎች የአካባቢ መንገዶች

📧 ድጋፍ: support@admin.birr‑pay
💬 ቴሌግራም: @birrpaysupportline ወይም @Birrpaysupport

payment_instructions.en:
💳 Payment Instructions:

Your subscription request has been submitted!

📋 Next Steps:
1. Wait for admin approval (usually within minutes)
2. You'll receive payment instructions
3. Complete payment using your preferred method
4. Your subscription will be activated

⏰ Processing time: Usually within 24 hours
📧 Questions? Contact: support@admin.birr‑pay
💬 Telegram: @birrpaysupportline or @Birrpaysupport
payment_instructions.am:
💳 የክፍያ መመሪያዎች:

የመዋቅር ጥያቄዎ ተላክ!

📋 ቀጣይ ደረጃዎች:
1. የአስተዳዳሪ ፈቃድ ይጠብቁ (አብዛኛውን ጊዜ በደቂቃዎች ውስጥ)
2. የክፍያ መመሪያዎች ይቀበላሉ
3. በሚመርጡት መንገድ ክፍያ ያጠናቅቁ
4. መዋቅርዎ ይጀምራል

⏰ የማስኬጃ ጊዜ: አብዛኛውን ጊዜ በ24 ሰዓት ውስጥ
📧 ጥያቄዎች? ያግኙ: support@admin.birr‑pay
💬 ቴሌግራም: @birrpaysupportline ወይም @Birrpaysupport
